name: Minimalism: A Clicker Game ALPHA
description:
A clicker game with a minimalistic theme.

You find a mysterious box on your doorstep.  No return address, no shipping label. Just a white box. You take the package inside your house.

Grabbing your trusty box cutter, you cut the neatly aligned tape and open it. Suddenly, a bright white light surrounds you and transports you into The Void.

Want to keep up to date with the game's progress? Click here to view the project's Trello list!

This is the first project that I am putting all of my effort into. If you have time, please let me know what you think of the idea, and feedback on how I can improve the game!

This game is now in the Alpha stage, more content will be added in later updates!
